text: Area code 264 is a telephone area code in the North American Numbering Plan. It covers Anguilla, a British overseas territory in the Caribbean. Area code 264 was established in 1997 when it was split from area code 809, which previously served the entire Caribbean region. The digits "264" spell out "ANG," which is a short form for Anguilla, making the code easy to remember for residents and visitors. Category:Area codes
title: Area code 264
